attributes.action: Removal of Palestinian flag at Mulberry Place town hall
attributes.additional_details:
The Palestinian flag is being flown at Mulberry place Town Hall.
Us Tower Hamlets and Uk citizens do not condone this and do not want to be associated with any of the actions of the Palestinian nation.
Flying this flag is highly insensitive and offensive particularly to the Jewish community.
We have had no consultation and have not been asked our views on this decision and we do not agree to the flying of this flag.
We ask it be removed immediately
